sentence.Network_en: This cycle repeats itself ad infinitum.
sentence.Network_cn: 该循环周而复始，永无止境。

sentence.Network_en: You cannot stay here ad infinitum without paying rent.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不付房租就不能永远住在这里。

sentence.Network_en: The TV station just shows repeats of old comedy programmes ad infinitum.
sentence.Network_cn: 电视台不停地重播老旧的喜剧节目.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 永远无限地(infinitum), 此释义来源于网络辞典。-相关网页短语更多收起网络短语 adv. 永远（无限地；以至无穷大） alw…

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... ad hominem 从个人出发 ad infinitum 无限 ad interim 暂时.
《数学专业英语词汇》 - 豆丁网 ... acyclic model theorem 非循环模型定理 ad infinitum 无穷地 adams circle 阿达姆斯圆.

auth_sentence.content: Repeating claims ad infinitum doesn't cut the mustard.

auth_sentence.content: The absurdity of division ad infinitum has become apparent.

auth_sentence.content: The comprehensive measurement exercise would extend ad infinitum.
